game.name: Train Simulator: Class 67 Diamond Jubilee Loco Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Drive the Queen aboard the Royal Train to her Jubilee Celebrations, pulled by the Class 67 Diesel Electric locomotive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Drive the Queen aboard the Royal Train to her Jubilee Celebrations, pulled by the Class 67 Diesel Electric locomotive.
